main event: A round, flaking light with a red tail was observed traveling from west to east over Stockton, California in July 1955. As it reached a point over the observers, it broke into many smaller parts traveling north-northwest at high speed, leaving trailing smoke and a traveling noise. The object appeared to disintegrate after a few minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially observed as a round, flaking light with a red tail.
The object broke into many smaller parts as it reached a point over the observers.
The smaller parts traveled north-northwest at a terrific speed, leaving trailing smoke and a traveling noise.
The object appeared to disintegrate after a few minutes.
The sighting lasted for about 20 minutes.
sighted object: round, flaking light with a red tail that broke into many smaller parts
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
